content: As one who has “adulted” for what seems like forever and is finally getting back to what she’s really called to do, I don’t feel it’s bad to take an odd job or two not related to a degree. Yes, I do have to still have a real world job to pay bills and cover those expenses that I created while “adulting.” However, even a bad job can provide great writing fodder or inspiration for confidently, competently, completely moving toward the right dream for you.
